GS25amark3_u:6: (3.0.3) strīdārādyair yad viśeṣyaṃ yādṛśaiḥ prastutaṃ padaiḥ
GS25amark3_u:10: (3.1.7) sukṛtī puṇyavān dhanyo mahecchas tu mahāśayaḥ
GS25amark3_u:25: (3.1.22) ibhya āḍhyo dhanī svāmī tvīśvaraḥ patirīśitā
GS25amark3_u:27: (3.1.24) adhikardhiḥ samṛddhaḥ syāt kuṭumbavyāpṛtas tu yaḥ
GS25amark3_u:32: (3.1.29) satkṛtyālaṅkṛtāṃ kanyāṃ yo dadāti sa kūkudaḥ
GS25amark3_u:33: (3.1.30) lakṣmīvān lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīlaḥ śrīmān snigdhastu vatsalaḥ
GS25amark3_u:39: (3.1.36) jālmo 'samīkṣyakārī syāt kuṇṭho mandaḥ kriyāsu yaḥ
GS25amark3_u:41: (3.1.38) sa kārmaḥ karmaśīlo yaḥ karmaśūras tu karmaṭhaḥ
GS25amark3_u:42: (3.1.39) bharaṇyabhuk karmakaraḥ karmakāras tu tat kriyaḥ
GS25amark3_u:55: (3.1.52) dhṛṣṭe dhṛṣṇag viyātaś ca pragalbhaḥ pratibhānvite
GS25amark3_u:59: (3.1.56) śraddhāluḥ śraddhayā yukte patayālus tu pātuke
GS25amark3_u:61: (3.1.58) śarārur ghātuko hiṃsraḥ syād varddhiṣṇus tu varddhanaḥ
GS25amark3_u:63: (3.1.60) bhūṣṇur śvaviṣṇur bhavitā vartiṣṇur vartanaḥ samau
GS25amark3_u:64: (3.1.61) nirākariṣṇuḥ kṣipnuḥ syāt sāndrasnigdhas tu meduraḥ
GS25amark3_u:65: (3.1.62) jñātā tu viduro vindur vikāsī tu vikasvaraḥ
GS25amark3_u:67: (3.1.64) sahiṣṇuḥ sahanaḥ kṣantā titikṣuḥ kṣamitā kṣamī
GS25amark3_u:73: (3.1.70) yassahāñcati sadhryaṅ sa sa tiryaṅ yastiro 'ñcati
GS25amark3_u:76: (3.1.73) syāj jalpākas tu vācālo vācāṭo bahugarhyavāk
GS25amark3_u:86: (3.1.83) nikṛtaḥ syād viprakṛto vipralabdhas tu vañcitaḥ
GS25amark3_u:87: (3.1.84) manohataḥ pratihataḥ pratibaddho hataś ca saḥ
GS25amark3_u:94: (3.1.91) dveṣye tvakṣigato vadhyaḥ śīrṣacchedya imau samau
GS25amark3_u:95: (3.1.92) viṣyo viṣeṇa yo vadhyo musalyo musalena yaḥ
GS25amark3_u:98: (3.1.95) karṇejapaḥ sūcakaḥ syāt piśuno durjanaḥ khalaḥ
GS25amark3_u:99: (3.1.96) nṛśaṃso ghātukaḥ krūraḥ pāpo dhūrtas tu vañcakaḥ
GS25amark3_u:102: (3.1.99) niḥsvas tu durvidho dīno daridro durgato 'pi saḥ
GS25amark3_u:109: (3.1.105) sundaraṃ ruciraṃ cāru suṣamaṃ sādhu śobhanam
GS25amark3_u:110: (3.1.106) kāntaṃ manoramaṃ rucyaṃ manojñaṃ mañju mañjulam
GS25amark3_u:117: (3.1.113) pūtaṃ pavitraṃ medhyaṃ ca vīdhraṃ tu vimalārthakam
GS25amark3_u:119: (3.1.115) asāraṃ phalgu śūnyaṃ tu vaśikaṃ tucchariktake
GS25amark3_u:123: (3.1.119) śreyān śreṣṭhaḥ puṣkalaḥ syāt sattamaś cātiśobhane
GS25amark3_u:127: (3.1.123) viśaṃkaṭaṃ pṛthu bṛhad viśālaṃ pṛthulaṃ mahat
GS25amark3_u:129: (3.1.125) stokālpakṣullakāḥ sūkṣmaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ dabhraṃ kṛśaṃ tanu
GS25amark3_u:133: (3.1.129) puruhūḥ puru bhūyiṣṭhaṃ sphāraṃ bhūyaśa ca bhūri ca
GS25amark3_u:134: (3.1.130) paraḥ śatādyās te yeṣāṃ parā saṃkhyā śatādikāt
GS25amark3_u:135: (3.1.131) gaṇanīye tu gaṇeyaṃ saṃkhyāte gaṇitamatha samaṃ sarvam
GS25amark3_u:138: (3.1.134) ghanaṃ nirantaraṃ sāndraṃ pelavaṃ viralaṃ tanu
GS25amark3_u:144: (3.1.140) davīyaś ca daviṣṭhaṃ ca sudūraṃ dīrghamāyatam
GS25amark3_u:155: (3.1.151) calanaṃ kampanaṃ kampraṃ calam lolaṃ calācalam
GS25amark3_u:158: (3.1.154) khakkhaṭaṃ kaṭhinaṃ krūraṃ kaṭhoraṃ niṣṭhuraṃ dhṛḍham
GS25amark3_u:162: (3.1.158) nūtnaś ca sukumāraṃ tu komalaṃ mṛdulam mṛdu
GS25amark3_u:175: (3.1.171) vāmaṃ śarīre savyaṃ syādapasavyaṃ tu dakṣiṇam
GS25amark3_u:176: (3.1.172) saṅkaṭam nā tu saṃbādhaḥ kalilaṃ gahanaṃ same
GS25amark3_u:178: (3.1.174) granthitaṃ sanditaṃ dṛbdhaṃ visṛtaṃ vistṛtaṃ tatam
GS25amark3_u:189: (3.1.185) syād vināśonmukhaṃ pakvaṃ hrīṇahrītau tu lajjite
GS25amark3_u:191: (3.1.187) prāpyaṃ gamyaṃ samāsādyaṃ syannaṃ rīṇaṃ snutaṃ srutam
GS25amark3_u:197: (3.1.193) niṣpakve kvathitaṃ pāke kṣīrājya haviṣāṃ śṛtam
GS25amark3_u:199: (3.1.195) pakvam pariṇate gūnaṃ hanne mīḍhaṃ tu mūtrite
GS25amark3_u:201: (3.1.197) dāntas tu damite śāntaḥ śamite prārthite 'rditaḥ
GS25amark3_u:202: (3.1.198) jñaptas tu Gyapite channaś chādite pūjite 'ñcitaḥ
GS25amark3_u:203: (3.1.199) pūrṇas tu pūrite kliṣṭaḥ kliśite 'vasite sitaḥ
GS25amark3_u:208: (3.1.204) ūtaṃ syūtamutaṃ ceti tritayaṃ tantu santate
GS25amark3_u:211: (3.1.207) saṃtāpitasaṃtaptau dhūpita dhūpāyitau ca dūnaś ca
GS25amark3_u:212: (3.1.208) hṛṣṭo mattas tṛptaḥ prahlannaḥ pramuditaḥ prītaḥ
GS25amark3_u:213: (3.1.209) chinnaṃ chātaṃ lūnaṃ kṛttaṃ dātaṃ ditaṃ chitaṃ vṛkṇam
GS25amark3_u:214: (3.1.210) srastaṃ dhvastaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ skannaṃ pannaṃ cyutaṃ galitam
GS25amark3_u:215: (3.1.211) labdhaṃ prāptaṃ vinnaṃ bhāvitamāsāditaṃ ca bhūtam ca
GS25amark3_u:217: (3.1.213) ārdraṃ sārdraṃ klinnaṃ timitaṃ smititaṃ samunnamuttaṃ ca
GS25amark3_u:218: (3.1.214) trātaṃ trāṇaṃ rakṣitamavitaṃ gopāyitaṃ ca guptaṃ ca
GS25amark3_u:240: (3.2.233) śamathas tu śamaḥ śāntir dāntis tu damatho damaḥ
GS25amark3_u:245: (3.2.238) sevanaṃ sīvanaṃ syūtir vidaraḥ sphuṭanaṃ bhidā
GS25amark3_u:250: (3.2.243) grahe grāho vaśaḥ kāntau rakṣṇas trāṇe raṇaḥ kaṇe
GS25amark3_u:251: (3.2.244) vyadho vedhe pacā pāke havo hūtau varo vṛttau
GS25amark3_u:252: (3.2.245) oṣaḥ ploṣe nayo nāye jyānir jīrṇau bhramo bhramau
GS25amark3_u:253: (3.2.246) sphātir vṛddhau prathā khyātau spṛṣṭiḥ pṛktau snavaḥ srave
GS25amark3_u:254: (3.2.247) edhā samṛddhau sphuraṇe sphuraṇā pramitau pramā
GS25amark3_u:255: (3.2.248) prasūtiḥ prasave ścyote prādhāraḥ klamathaḥ klame
GS25amark3_u:258: (3.2.251) unnāya unnaye śrāyaḥ śrayaṇe jayane jayaḥ
GS25amark3_u:259: (3.2.252) nigādo nigade mādo mada udvega udbhrame
GS25amark3_u:270: (3.2.263) pravāhas tu pravṛttiḥ syāt pravaho gamanaṃ bahiḥ
GS25amark3_u:278: (3.2.271) vistāro vigraho vyāsaḥ sa ca śabdasya vistaraḥ
GS25amark3_u:280: (3.2.273) saṃstavaḥ syāt paricayaḥ prasaras tu visarpaṇam
GS25amark3_u:281: (3.2.274) nīvākas tu prayāmaḥ syāt saṃnidhiḥ saṃnikarṣaṇam
GS25amark3_u:299: (3.2.292) artanaṃ ca ṛtīyā ca hṛṇīyā ca ghṛṇārthakāḥ
GS25amark3_u:300: (3.2.293) syād vyatyāso viparyāso vyatyayaś ca viparyaye
GS25amark3_u:302: (3.2.295) preṣaṇaṃ yat samāhūya tatra syāt pratiśāsanam
GS25amark3_u:303: (3.2.296) sa saṃstāvaḥ kratuṣu yā stutibhūmir dvijanmanām
GS25amark3_u:304: (3.2.297) nidhāya takṣyate yatra kāṣṭhe kāṣṭhaṃ sa uddhanaḥ
GS25amark3_u:305: (3.2.298) stambaghnas tu stambaghanaḥ stambo yena nihanyate
GS25amark3_u:306: (3.2.299) āvidho vidhyate yena tatra viṣvaksame nighaḥ
GS25amark3_u:307: (3.2.300) utKāraś ca nikāraś ca dvau dhānyotkṣepaṇārthakau
GS25amark3_u:311: (3.2.304) javane jūtiḥ sātis tvavasāne syādatha jvare jūrtiḥ
GS25amark3_u:319: (3.2.312) grāmatā janatā dhūmyā pāśyā galyā pṛthakpṛthak
GS25amark3_u:325: (3.3.315) bhūriprayogā ye yeṣu paryāyeṣvapi teṣu te
GS25amark3_u:326: (3.3.316) ākāśe tridive nāko lokas tu bhuvane jane
GS25amark3_u:327: (3.3.317) padye yaśasi ca ślokaḥ śare khaḍge ca sāyakaḥ
GS25amark3_u:332: (3.3.322) marute vedhasi braghne puṃsi kaḥ kaṃ śiro 'mbunoḥ
GS25amark3_u:335: (3.3.325) kamaṇḍalau ca karakaḥ sugate ca vināyakaḥ
GS25amark3_u:336: (3.3.326) kiṣkur haste vitastau ca śūkakīṭe ca vṛścikaḥ
GS25amark3_u:338: (3.3.328) syād bhūtikaṃ tu bhūnimbe kattṛṇe bhūstṛṇe 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:339: (3.3.329) jyotsnikāyāṃ ca ghoṣe ca kośātakyatha kaṭphale
GS25amark3_u:340: (3.3.330) site ca khadire somavalkaḥ syādatha sihvake
GS25amark3_u:341: (3.3.331) tilakalke ca piṇyāko bāhlīkaṃ rāmaṭhe 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:352: (3.3.342) dhenukā tu kareṇvāṃ ca meghajāle ca kālikā
GS25amark3_u:360: (3.3.350) sūcyagre kṣudraśatrau ca romaharṣe ca kaṇṭakaḥ
GS25amark3_u:362: (3.3.352) paryaṅkaḥ syāt parikare syād vyāgre 'pi ca lubdhakaḥ
GS25amark3_u:363: (3.3.353) peṭakas triṣu vṛnde 'pi gurau deśye ca deśikaḥ
GS25amark3_u:365: (3.3.355) puṣpareṇau ca kiñjalkaḥ śulko 'strī strīdhane 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:372: (3.3.362) śaṅkho nidhau lalaṭāsthnikambau na strīndriye 'pi kham
GS25amark3_u:383: (3.3.373) cātake hariṇe puṃsi sāraṅgaḥ śavale triṣu
GS25amark3_u:384: (3.3.374) kapau ca plavagaḥ śāpe tvabhiṣaṅgaḥ parābhave
GS25amark3_u:385: (3.3.375) yānādyaṅge yugaḥ puṃsi yugaṃ yugme kṛtādiṣu
GS25amark3_u:387: (3.3.377) lakṣyadṛṣṭyā striyāṃ puṃsi gaur liṅgaṃ cihna śephasoḥ
GS25amark3_u:395: (3.3.385) viparyāse vistare ca prapañcaḥ pāvake śuciḥ
GS25amark3_u:396: (3.3.386) māsyamātye cāpyupadhe puṃsi medhye site triṣu
GS25amark3_u:397: (3.3.387) abhiṣvaṅge spṛhāyāṃ ca gabhastau ca ruciḥ striyām
GS25amark3_u:404: (3.3.394) dharmarājau jinayamau kuñjo dante 'pi na striyām
GS25amark3_u:406: (3.3.396) same kṣmāṃśe raṇe 'pyājiḥ prajā syāt saṃtatau jane
GS25amark3_u:407: (3.3.397) abjau śaṅkhaśaśāṅkau ca svake nitye nijaṃ triṣu
GS25amark3_u:410: (3.3.400) saṃjñā syāc cetanā nāma hastādyaiś cārthasūcanā
GS25amark3_u:411: (3.3.401) doṣajñau vaidyavidvāṃsau jño vidvān somajo 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:415: (3.3.405) devaśilpinyapi tvaṣṭā diṣṭaṃ daive 'pi na dvayoḥ
GS25amark3_u:420: (3.3.410) sūkṣmailāyāṃ truṭiḥ strī syāt kāle 'lpe saṃśaye 'pi sā
GS25amark3_u:422: (3.3.412) vyuṣṭiḥ phale samṛddhau ca dṛṣṭir jñāne 'kṣṇi darśane
GS25amark3_u:423: (3.3.413) iṣṭir yogecchayoḥ sṛṣṭaṃ niścite bahuni triṣu ('bahūni'?)
GS25amark3_u:425: (3.3.415) paṭur dvau vācyaliṅgau ca nīlakaṇṭhaḥ śive 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:426: (3.3.416) poṭā dāsī dviliṃgā ca ghṛṣṭī gharṣaṇasūkarau
GS25amark3_u:434: (3.3.424) sarpa māṃsātpaśū vyāḍau gobhūvācas tviḍā ilāḥ
GS25amark3_u:447: (3.3.437) paṇo dyūtādiṣūtsṛṣṭe bhṛtau mūlye dhane 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:450: (3.3.440) varṇo dvijādau śuklādau stutau varṇaṃ tu vākṣare
GS25amark3_u:451: (3.3.441) aruṇo bhāskare 'pi syād varṇabhede 'pi ca triṣu
GS25amark3_u:452: (3.3.442) sthāṇuḥ śarvo 'pyatha droṇaḥ kāke 'pyājau rave raṇaḥ
GS25amark3_u:453: (3.3.443) grāmaṇīr nāpite puṃsi śreṣṭhe grāmādhipe triṣu
GS25amark3_u:455: (3.3.445) hariṇī syān mṛgī hemapratimā haritā ca yā
GS25amark3_u:456: (3.3.446) triṣu pāṇḍau ca hariṇaḥ sthūṇā stambhe 'pi veśmanaḥ
GS25amark3_u:458: (3.3.448) vaṇikpathe ca vipaṇiḥ surā pratyak ca vāruṇī
GS25amark3_u:459: (3.3.449) kareṇuribhyāṃ strī nebhe draviṇaṃ tu balaṃ dhanam
GS25amark3_u:467: (3.3.457) pravaṇe kramanimnorvyāṃ prahve nā tu catuṣpathe
GS25amark3_u:469: (3.3.459) setau ca caraṇo veṇī nadībhede kacoccaye
GS25amark3_u:475: (3.3.465) yantā hastipake sūte bhartā dhātari poṣṭari
GS25amark3_u:476: (3.3.466) yānapātre śiśau potaḥ pretaḥ prāṇyantare mṛte
GS25amark3_u:477: (3.3.467) grahabhede dhvaje ketuḥ pārthive tanaye sutaḥ
GS25amark3_u:479: (3.3.469) mūrdhābhiṣikto bhūpe 'pi ṛtuḥ strī kusume 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:482: (3.3.472) kṣattā syāt sārathau dvāḥsthe kṣatriyāyāṃ ca śūdraje
GS25amark3_u:486: (3.3.476) śleṣmādi rasa raktādi mahā bhūtāni tad guṇāḥ
GS25amark3_u:498: (3.3.488) raverarciś ca śastraṃ ca vahnijvālā ca hetayaḥ
GS25amark3_u:500: (3.3.490) paṅktiś chando 'pi daśamaṃ syāt prabhāve 'pi cāyatiḥ
GS25amark3_u:501: (3.3.491) pattir gatau ca mūle tu pakṣatiḥ pakṣabhedayoḥ
GS25amark3_u:502: (3.3.492) prakṛtir yoniliṅge ca kaiśikyādyāś ca vṛttayaḥ
GS25amark3_u:503: (3.3.493) sikatāḥ syur vālukāpi vede śravasi ca śrutiḥ
GS25amark3_u:507: (3.3.497) vāsitā strī kariṇyoś ca vārtā vṛttau janaśrutau
GS25amark3_u:508: (3.3.498) vārtaṃ phalgunyaroge ca triṣvapsu ca ghṛtāmṛte
GS25amark3_u:512: (3.3.502) yukte kṣmādāvṛte bhūtaṃ prāṇyatīte same triṣu
GS25amark3_u:514: (3.3.504) mahad rājyaṃ cāvagītaṃ janye syād garhite triṣu
GS25amark3_u:515: (3.3.505) śvetaṃ rūpye 'pi rajataṃ hemni rūpye site triṣu
GS25amark3_u:516: (3.3.506) triṣvito jagadiṅge 'pi raktaṃ nīlyādi rāgi ca
GS25amark3_u:517: (3.3.507) avadātaḥ site pīte śuddhe baddhārjunau sitau
GS25amark3_u:520: (3.3.510) khyāte hṛṣṭe pratīto 'bhijātas tu kulaje budhe
GS25amark3_u:522: (3.3.512) dvau cāmla paruṣau śuktau śitī dhavalamecakau
GS25amark3_u:523: (3.3.513) satye sādhau vidyamāne praśaste 'bhyarhite ca sat
GS25amark3_u:530: (3.3.520) samit saṅge raṇe 'pi strī vyavasthāyāmapi sthitiḥ
GS25amark3_u:533: (3.3.523) samarthas triṣu śaktisthe saṃbaddhārthe hite 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:536: (3.3.526) śāstra draviṇayor granthaḥ saṃsthādhāre sthitau mṛtau
GS25amark3_u:539: (3.3.529) apavādau tu nindājñe dāyādau suta bāndhavau
GS25amark3_u:543: (3.3.533) syāt prasādo 'nurage 'pi sūdaḥ syād vyañjane 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:548: (3.3.538) padaṃ vyavasiti trāṇa sthāna lakṣmāṅghri vastuṣu
GS25amark3_u:550: (3.3.540) triṣviṣṭa madhurau svādū mṛdū cātīkṣṇa komalau
GS25amark3_u:551: (3.3.541) mūḍhālpāpaṭu nirbhāgyā mandāḥ syur dvau tu śāradau
GS25amark3_u:554: (3.3.544) vyāmo vaṭaś ca nyagrodhāvutsedhaḥ kāya unnatiḥ
GS25amark3_u:556: h ca vivadhau vīvadhau ca tau
GS25amark3_u:559: (3.3.548) syuḥ samarthana nīvāka niyamāś ca samādhayaḥ
GS25amark3_u:563: (3.3.552) vidhir vidhāne daive 'pi praṇidhiḥ prārthane care
GS25amark3_u:564: (3.3.553) budha vṛddhau paṇḍite 'pi skandhaḥ samudaye 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:565: (3.3.554) deśe nada viśeṣe 'bdhau sindhur nā sariti striyām
GS25amark3_u:566: (3.3.555) vidhā vidhau prakāre ca sādhū ramye 'pi ca triṣu
GS25amark3_u:567: (3.3.556) vadhūr jāyā snuṣā strī ca sudhā lepo 'mṛtaṃ snuhī
GS25amark3_u:568: (3.3.557) sandhā pratijñā maryādā śraddhā saṃpratyayaḥ spṛhā
GS25amark3_u:574: (3.3.563) bādhā niṣedhe duḥkhe ca jñātṛcāndrisurā budhāḥ
GS25amark3_u:576: (3.3.564) sūrya vahnī citrabhānū bhānū raśmi divākarau
GS25amark3_u:577: (3.3.565) bhūtātmānau dhātṛ dehau mūrkha nīcau pṛthagjanau
GS25amark3_u:585: (3.3.573) ātmā yatno dhṛtir buddhiḥ svabhāvo brahma varṣma ca
GS25amark3_u:588: (3.3.576) ghano meghe mūrtiguṇe triṣu mūrte nirantare
GS25amark3_u:589: (3.3.577) inaḥ sūrye prabhau rājā mṛgāṅke kṣatriye nṛpe
GS25amark3_u:592: (3.3.580) tvag dehayorapi tanuḥ sūnādho jihvikāpi ca
GS25amark3_u:595: (3.3.583) vedas tattvaṃ tapo brahma brahmā vipraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GS25amark3_u:596: (3.3.584) utsāhane ca hiṃsāyāṃ sūcane cāpi gandhanam
GS25amark3_u:599: (3.3.587) syāt kaulīnaṃ lokavāde yuddhe paśvahi pakṣiṇām
GS25amark3_u:606: (3.3.594) niryātanaṃ vaira śuddhau dāne nyāsārpaṇe 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:634: (3.3.620) śiphā śikhāyāṃ sariti māṃsikāyāṃ ca mātari
GS25amark3_u:635: (3.3.621) śaphaṃ mūle tarūṇāṃ syādgavādīnāṃ khure 'pi ca
GS25amark3_u:640: (3.3.625) kambur nā valaye śaṅkhe dvijihvau sarpasūcakau
GS25amark3_u:648: (3.3.632) syādbheryāṃ dundubhiḥ puṃsi syādakṣe dundubhiḥ striyām
GS25amark3_u:650: (3.3.634) kṣatriye 'pi ca nābhir nā surabhir gavi ca striyām
GS25amark3_u:651: (3.3.635) sabhā saṃsadi sabhye ca triṣvadhyakṣe 'pi vallabhaḥ
GS25amark3_u:657: (3.3.640) vaṇikpathaḥ puraṃ vedo nigamā nāgaro vaṇik
GS25amark3_u:658: (3.3.641) naigamau dvau bale rāmo nīlacārusite triṣu
GS25amark3_u:659: (3.3.642) śabdādipūrvo vṛnde 'pi grāmaḥ krāntau ca vikramaḥ
GS25amark3_u:661: (3.3.644) uṣṇe 'pi gharmaś ceṣṭālaṅkāre bhrāntau ca vibhramaḥ
GS25amark3_u:663: (3.3.646) kṣitikṣāntyoḥ kṣamā yukte kṣamaṃ śakte hite triṣu
GS25amark3_u:664: (3.3.647) triṣu śyāmau haritkṛṣṇau śyāmā syācchārivā niśā
GS25amark3_u:668: (3.3.651) jīrṇaṃ ca paribhuktaṃ ca yātayāmamidaṃ dvayam
GS25amark3_u:684: (3.3.666) viṣayo yasya yo jñātas tatra śabdādikeṣvapi
GS25amark3_u:685: (3.3.667) niryāse 'pi kaṣāyo strī sabhāyāṃ ca pratiśrayaḥ
GS25amark3_u:686: (3.3.668) prāyo bhūmnyantagamane manyur dainye kratau krudhi
GS25amark3_u:688: (3.3.670) vīryaṃ bale prabhāve ca dravyaṃ bhavye guṇāśraye
GS25amark3_u:689: (3.3.671) dhiṣṇyaṃ sthāne gṛhe bhe 'gnau bhāgyaṃ karma śubhāśubham
GS25amark3_u:690: (3.3.672) kaśeru hemnor gāṅgeyaṃ viśalyā dantikāpi ca
GS25amark3_u:693: (3.3.675) upāyaḥ karma ceṣṭā ca cikitsā ca nava kriyāḥ
GS25amark3_u:701: (3.3.683) nyāyye 'pi madhyaṃ saumyaṃ tu sundare somadaivate
GS25amark3_u:712: (3.3.693) muktāśuddhau ca tāraḥ syācchāro vāyau sa tu triṣu
GS25amark3_u:721: (3.3.702) vipule nakule viṣṇau babhrurnā piṅgale triṣu
GS25amark3_u:722: (3.3.703) sāro bale sthirāṃśe ca nyāyye klībaṃ vare triṣu
GS25amark3_u:726: (3.3.707) devādvṛte varaḥ śreṣṭhe triṣu klībaṃ manākpriye
GS25amark3_u:727: (3.3.708) vaṃśāṅkure karīro 'strī tarubhede ghaṭe ca nā
GS25amark3_u:734: (3.3.715) kṣudrā vyaṅgā naṭī veśyā saraghā kaṇṭakārikā
GS25amark3_u:736: (3.3.717) alpe ca parimāṇe sā mātraṃ kārtsnye 'vadhāraṇe
GS25amark3_u:741: (3.3.722) mukhāgre kroḍahalayoḥ potraṃ gotraṃ tu nāmni ca
GS25amark3_u:744: (3.3.725) cakraṃ rāṣṭre 'pyakṣaraṃ tu mokṣe 'pi kṣīramapsu ca
GS25amark3_u:749: (3.3.730) daro 'striyāṃ bhaye śvabhre vajro 'strī hīrake pavau
GS25amark3_u:769: (3.3.750) caruḥ sthālyāṃ haviḥ paktāvadhīraḥ kātare cale
GS25amark3_u:781: (3.3.761) kalā śilpe kālabhede cālī sakhyāvalī api
GS25amark3_u:783: (3.3.763) bahulāḥ kṛttikā gāvo bahulo 'gnau śitau triṣu
GS25amark3_u:787: (3.3.767) śīlaṃ svabhāve sadvṛtte sasye hetukṛte phalam
GS25amark3_u:788: (3.3.768) chadirnetrarujoḥ klībaṃ samūhe paṭalaṃ na nā
GS25amark3_u:791: (3.3.771) kukūlaṃ śaṅkubhiḥ kīrṇe śvabhre nā tu tuṣānale
GS25amark3_u:795: (3.3.775) karālo danture tuṅge cārau dakṣe ca peśalaḥ
GS25amark3_u:810: (3.3.789) anubhāvaḥ prabhāve ca satāṃ ca matiniścaye
GS25amark3_u:813: (3.3.792) dhruvo bhabhede klībe tu niścite śāśvate triṣu
GS25amark3_u:814: (3.3.793) svo jñātāvātmani svaṃ triṣvātmīye svo 'striyāṃ dhane
GS25amark3_u:820: (3.3.798) dvau viśau vaiśyamanujau dvau cārābhimarau spaśau
GS25amark3_u:821: (3.3.799) dvau rāśī puñjameṣādyau dvau vaṃśau kulamaskarau
GS25amark3_u:826: (3.3.804) vaśā strī kariṇī ca syāt dṛgjñāne jñātari triṣu
GS25amark3_u:829: (3.3.807) nāśaḥ kṣaye tirodhāne jīviteśaḥ priye yame
GS25amark3_u:837: (3.3.814) śukrale mūṣike śreṣṭhe sukṛte vṛṣabhe vṛṣaḥ
GS25amark3_u:842: (3.3.819) pumbhāve tatkriyāyāṃ ca pauruṣaṃ viṣamapsu ca
GS25amark3_u:845: (3.3.822) prekṣā nṛttekṣaṇaṃ prajñā bhikṣā sevārthanā bhṛtiḥ
GS25amark3_u:846: (3.3.823) tviṭ śobhāpi triṣu pare nyakṣaṃ kārtsnyanikṛṣṭayoḥ
GS25amark3_u:850: (3.3.827) doṣo vātādike doṣā rātrau dakṣo 'pi kukkuṭe
GS25amark3_u:855: (3.3.831) śṛṅgārādau viṣe vīrye guṇe rāge drave rasaḥ
GS25amark3_u:857: (3.3.833) devabhede 'nale raśmau vasū ratne dhane vasu
GS25amark3_u:860: (3.3.836) prasūraśvāpi bhūdyāvau rodasyau rodasī ca te
GS25amark3_u:864: (3.3.840) rajo guṇe ca strīpuṣpe rāhau dhvānte guṇe tamaḥ
GS25amark3_u:865: (3.3.841) chandaḥ padye 'bhilāṣe ca tapaḥ kṛcchrādikarma ca
GS25amark3_u:866: (3.3.842) saho balaṃ sahā mārgo nabhaḥ khaṃ śrāvaṇo nabhāḥ
GS25amark3_u:869: (3.3.844) ojo dīptau bale srota indriye nimnagāraye
GS25amark3_u:870: (3.3.845) tejaḥ prabhāve dīptau ca bale śukre 'pyatastriṣu
GS25amark3_u:888: (3.3.861) svitpraśne ca vitarke ca tu syādbhede 'vadhāraṇe
GS25amark3_u:903: (3.3.876) upamāyāṃ vikalpe vā sāmi tvardhe jugupsite
GS25amark3_u:904: (3.3.877) amā saha samīpe ca kaṃ vāriṇi ca mūrdhani
GS25amark3_u:906: (3.3.879) tūṣṇīmarthe sukhe joṣaṃ kiṃ pṛcchāyāṃ jugupsane
GS25amark3_u:913: (3.3.886) svarge pare ca loke svar vārtāsaṃbhāvyayoḥ kila
GS25amark3_u:925: (3.4.894) srāg jhaṭityañjasāhnāya drāṅ maṅkṣu sapadi drute
GS25amark3_u:927: (3.4.896) pṛthag vināntareṇarte hiruṅ nānā ca varjane
GS25amark3_u:928: (3.4.897) yat tad yatas tato hetāvasākalye tu cic cana
GS25amark3_u:929: (3.4.898) kadācijjātu sārdhaṃ tu sākaṃ satrā samaṃ saha
GS25amark3_u:930: (3.4.899) ānukūlyārthakaṃ prādhvaṃ vyarthake tu vṛthā mudhā
GS25amark3_u:931: (3.4.900) āho utāho kimuta vikalpe kiṃ kimūta ca
GS25amark3_u:932: (3.4.901) tu hi ca sma ha vai pādapūraṇe pūjane svati
GS25amark3_u:933: (3.4.902) divāhnītyatha doṣā ca naktaṃ ca rajanāviti
GS25amark3_u:935: (3.4.904) syuḥ pyāṭ pāḍaṅga he hai bhoḥ samayā nikaṣā hiruk
GS25amark3_u:936: (3.4.905) atarkite tu sahasā syāt puraḥ purato 'grataḥ
GS25amark3_u:937: (3.4.906) svāhā devahavirdāne śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ vaṣaṭ svadhā
GS25amark3_u:939: (3.4.908) va vā yathā tathevaivaṃ sāmye 'ho hīti vismaye
GS25amark3_u:940: (3.4.909) maune tu tūṣṇīṃ tūṣṇīkāṃ sadyaḥ sapadi tatkṣaṇe
GS25amark3_u:942: (3.4.911) antareṇa ca madhye syuḥ prasahya tu haṭhārthakam
GS25amark3_u:944: (3.4.913) abhāve nahya no nāpi mā sma mālaṃ ca vāraṇe
GS25amark3_u:945: (3.4.914) pakṣāntare cedyadi ca tattve tvaddhāñjasā dvayam
GS25amark3_u:950: (3.4.919) niṣṣamaṃ duṣṣamaṃ garhye yathāsvaṃ tu yathāyatham
GS25amark3_u:951: (3.4.920) mṛṣā mithyā ca vitathe yathārthaṃ tu yathātatham
GS25amark3_u:957: (3.4.926) asti satve ruṣoktāvu ūṃ praśne 'nunaye tvayi
GS25amark3_u:960: (3.4.929) sāyaṃ sāye prage prātaḥ prabhāte nikaṣāntike
GS25amark3_u:982: (3.5.947) strībhāvādāvani ktiṇ ṇvul ṇac ṇvuc kyab yujiñṅ ni śāḥ
GS25amark3_u:984: (3.5.949) tatkrīḍāyāṃ praharaṇaṃ cen mauṣṭā pāllavā ṇa dik
GS25amark3_u:985: (3.5.950) ghaño ñaḥ sā kriyāsyāṃ ced dāṇḍapātā hi phālgunī
GS25amark3_u:986: (3.5.951) śyainampātā ca mṛgayā tailampātā svadheti dik
GS25amark3_u:991: (3.5.956) picchā vitaṇḍā kākiṇyaścūrṇiḥ śāṇī druṇī darat
GS25amark3_u:992: (3.5.957) sātiḥ kanthā tathāsandī nābhī rājasabhāpi ca
GS25amark3_u:993: (3.5.958) jhallarī carcarī pārī horā laṭvā ca sidhmalā
GS25amark3_u:994: (3.5.959) lākṣā likṣā ca gaṇḍūṣā gṛdhrasī camasī masī
GS25amark3_u:1004: (3.5.968) nāmnyakartari bhāve ca ghañ jab naṅ ṇa ghāthucaḥ
GS25amark3_u:1005: (3.5.969) lyuḥ kartarīmanic bhāve ko ghoḥ kiḥ prāditonyataḥ
GS25amark3_u:1011: (3.5.975) gaḍuḥ karaṇḍo laguḍo karaṇḍaśca kiṇo ghuṇaḥ
GS25amark3_u:1023: (3.5.986) koṭyāḥ śatādisaṃkhyānyā vā lakṣā niyutaṃ ca tat
GS25amark3_u:1036: (3.5.999) cocaṃ picchaṃ gṛhasthūṇaṃ tirīṭaṃ marma yojanam
GS25amark3_u:1044: (3.5.1006) kuṣṭhaṃ muṇḍaṃ śīdhu bustaṃ kṣveḍitaṃ kṣemakuṭṭimam
GS25amark3_u:1049: (3.5.1011) tan noktamiha loke 'pi tac cedastyastu śeṣavat
GS25amark3_u:1054: (3.5.1015) mūṣā sṛpāṭī karkandhūryaṣṭiḥ śāṭī kaṭī kuṭī
GS25amark3_u:1059: (3.5.1019) syādvā nṛsenaṃ śvaniśaṃ gośālamitare ca dik
GS25amark3_u:1061: (3.5.1021) trikhaṭvaṃ ca trikhaṭvī ca tritakṣaṃ ca tritakṣyapi
GS25amark3_u:1063: (3.5.1022) triṣu pātrī puṭī vāṭī peṭī kuvaladāḍimau
GS25amark3_u:1065: (3.5.1024) paraṃ liṅgaṃ svapradhāne dvandve tatpuruṣe 'pi tat
GS25amark3_u:1073: (3.5.1032) paraṃ virodhe śeṣaṃ tu jñeyaṃ śiṣṭaprayogataḥ
GS25amark3_u:1093: evaṃ sarveṣāṃ kāṇḍānāṃ yogaḥ mū. ślo. 1497\,
